name: n8n-workflow-docs
description: N8N Workflow Documentation System - Node.js Implementation

scripts.build: npm run init && npm run index -- --force && npm run build:json && npm run build:static
scripts.build:netlify: npm run build:json:prebuilt && npm run build:static
scripts.build:json:prebuilt: echo 'Using pre-built JSON files for Netlify deployment'
scripts.build:static: cp -r static/* . && (cp -r api-static . 2>/dev/null || echo 'api-static not found, skipping') && echo 'Static files copied' && (ls -la api-static/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No api-static directory') && echo 'Build complete'
